Package de.javakaffee.web.msm

Interface Summary
SessionAttributesTranscoder The SessionAttributesTranscoder is responsible for serializing/deserializing the session attributes map to/from a byte array.
TranscoderFactory This factory is used to create a Transcoder to serialize/deserialize sessions to/from memcached.
 

Class Summary
BackupSessionService This service is responsible for storing sessions memcached.
BackupSessionTask Stores the provided session in memcached if the session was modified or if the session needs to be relocated (set force to true).
CommitInterceptingActionHook This ActionHook invokes CommitInterceptingActionHook.beforeCommit() if CommitInterceptingActionHook.action(ActionCode, Object) is invoked with ActionCode.ACTION_COMMIT and if the response is not yet committed.
DummyMemcachedBackupSessionManager This MemcachedBackupSessionManager can be used for debugging session deserialization - to see if serialized session data actually can be deserialized.
JavaSerializationTranscoder A SessionAttributesTranscoder that serializes catalina StandardSessions using java serialization (and the serialization logic of StandardSession as found in StandardSession.writeObjectData(ObjectOutputStream) and StandardSession.readObjectData(ObjectInputStream)).
JavaSerializationTranscoderFactory A TranscoderFactory that creates JavaSerializationTranscoder instances.
JavaSessionSerializationTranscoder A Transcoder that serializes catalina StandardSessions using java serialization (and the serialization of StandardSession via StandardSession.writeObjectData(ObjectOutputStream) and StandardSession.readObjectData(ObjectInputStream)).
LRUCache<K,V> An LRUCache that supports a maximum number of cache entries and a time to live for them.
MemcachedBackupSession The session class used by the MemcachedBackupSessionManager.
MemcachedBackupSessionManager This Manager stores session in configured memcached nodes after the response is finished (committed).
MemcachedTest  
NodeAvailabilityCache<K> An LRUCache that supports a maximum number of cache entries and a time to live for them.
NodeIdResolver Resolves an InetSocketAddress to a memcached node id.
NodeIdResolver.Builder Allows to build a NodeIdResolver.
NodeIdResolver.MapBasedResolver A NodeIdResolver that is based on a node-address to node-id Map.
NodeIdService Provides services related to node ids.
SessionIdFormat This class defines the session id format: It creates session ids based on the original session id and the memcached id, and it extracts the session id and memcached id from a compound session id.
SessionTranscoder A subclass of SerializingTranscoder that is used to deserialize sessions that are still stored in memcached with the old serialization format (the whole session was serialized by the serialization strategy, not only attributes).
Statistics  
Statistics.MinMaxAvgProbe  
SuffixLocatorBinaryConnectionFactory This ConnectionFactory uses the SuffixBasedNodeLocator as NodeLocator and overwrites methods as BinaryConnectionFactory does it as well.
SuffixLocatorConnectionFactory This ConnectionFactory uses the SuffixBasedNodeLocator as NodeLocator.
TranscoderService This service is responsible for serializing/deserializing session data so that this can be stored in / loaded from memcached.
TranscoderWrapperStatisticsSupport A Transcoder that delegates all calls to a provided delegate.
 

Exception Summary
InvalidVersionException This exception is thrown, if session data was loaded from memcached but the version does not match the current version.
NodeFailureException This exception is thrown when a node is not available.
